snippet.title: THE HUNGER GAMES ADVENTURES Trailer
snippet.description:
CGRtrailers, from Classic Game Room®, presents a trailer for THE HUNGER GAMES ADVENTURES from Lionsgate and Funtactix. Taking place in the Hunger Games universe created by Suzanne Collins, fans can now enter and inhabit the world of Panem like never before. This is social-based game is available for play on Facebook -- it launched on the same day has the box office smashing motion picture. Enjoy!

Check out more video game previews and trailers from Classic Game Room's CGRtrailers at http://www.youtube.com/CGRtrailers

Get more Classic Game Room on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/ClassicGameRoom
